mapper.select: select count(*) from t_user where user_name=#{userName} and pass_word=#{passWord}
SELECT user_id,user_name,credits FROM t_user WHERE user_name =#{username}
SELECT UR.*, ROLE.ROLE_NAME AS role_name, ROLE.ROLE_CODE AS role_code FROM TBL_USER_ROLES UR,TBL_ROLE ROLE WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROLE.ROLE_ID = UR.ROLE_ID

SELECT DISTINCT (f.ID), f.FUNC_NAME, f.FUNC_URL, f.PARENT_ID, f.FUNC_LEVEL, f.FUNC_DESC, f.SHOW_ORDER, f.ENABLE FROM TBL_USER_ROLES r, TBL_PERMISSION p, TBL_FUNCTION f WHERE r.USER_ID = #{userId} AND r.ROLE_ID = p.ROLE_ID AND p.FUNC_ID = f.ID AND f.ENABLE != 1 ORDER BY f.FUNC_LEVEL
